ClientDescription: A powerful VRChat Client with many features
FeatureRequiresRestartText: Changing this feature requires a restart. Restart now?
ClearVRAMDescription: Clears your RAM/VRAM potentially increasing FPS
DiscordDescription: Join our official discord and be a part of the community
ClearHUDMessagesDescription: Clears all currently queued messages and shown on screen
ProtectionsMenuDescription: A menu full of protection options and safety related features
AntiAvatarIntroMusicDescription: Stops avatars from playing their annoying intro music
AntiDisconnectExploitDescription: Prevents 'Unusual Client Behaviour' from happening due to maliciously crafted events
AntiFreezeExploitDescription: Prevents malicious events from 'freezing' your game for an extended period of time
AntiInstanceLockDescription: Prevents Instance Lock from affecting you so you can join instances no matter what
RPCLoggerDescription: Logs every RPC Event sent by people
RemoveAllPortalsDescription: Deletes all currently dropped portals in the lobby
PortalConfirmationDescription: Creates a popup asking if you really want to go through a portal you're about to enter
AutoDeleteOtherPortalsDescription: Auto deletes portals dropped by non friends
AutoDeleteFriendsPortalsDescription: Auto deletes portals dropped by friends
AutoDeleteDistantPlacedPortalsDescriptio: Auto deletes portals that are dropped far from their owner
AllowFriendsDistantPlacedPortalsDescript: Allows friends to place distant portals from them
PortalDroppedToofarRemoved: Removed portal from {username} for being dropped too far from them (Distance: {distance})
ModerationMenuDescription: Moderation features related to people joining, leaving, blocking you, etc
EnableModerationLoggingDescription: Global toggle for all features in this tab
VRChatStaffWarningDescription: Alerts you if you encounter a VRChat Staff in any instance
ModerationMicOffDetected: {username} tried to turn your microphone off
ModerationJoinMenuDescription: Features related to people joining your instance
ModerationLeaveMenuDescription: Features related to people leaving your instance
ModerationBlockMenuDescription: Features related to people blocking you
ModerationBlockPreventDescription: People who block you will still be visible (They still can't see you, but you can see them)
ModerationMicOffMenuNameDescription: Features related to people turning your mic off
ModerationMicOffPreventDescription: Prevents instance owners from turning your microphone off
ModerationMuteMenuDescription: Features related to people muting you
ModerationWarnMenuDescription: Features related to people warning you
ModerationWarnPreventDescription: Prevents instance owners from giving you warnings
ModerationInstanceMasterMenuDescription: Tells you who is the new instance master
AntiIPLoggingVideoPlayerSafetyDescriptio: Protects you from certain urls people try play via video players
AntiIPLoggingImageThumbnailSafetyDescrip: Protects you from certain urls when trying to see avatar/world thumbnails
SerializationDetectionDescription: Tries to correctly identify people who use serialization and notify about it
InvisibleDetectionDescription: Tries to correctly identify people who join with invisibility on
AntiCrashMenuDescription: Features related to preventing people from crashing you
WhitelistAvatarByIDDescription: Allows you to whitelist an avatar and prevent it from being cleaned by the anti crash system
AntiCrashPublicLobbyOnlyDescription: Enables the AntiCrash only in public lobbies
AntiShaderCrashDescription: Prevents maliciously crafted shaders from crashing you
AntiAudioCrashDescription: Prevents avatars with a high number of audio sources from crashing you
AntiMeshCrashDescription: Tries to prevent maliciously crafted meshes from crashing you
AntiMaterialCrashDescription: Prevents an avatar with too many materials from crashing you
AntiFinalIKCrashDescription: Prevents a all known exploits regarding FinalIK from crashing you
AntiClothCrashDescription: Prevents maliciously crafted cloth from crashing you
AntiParticleSystemCrashDescription: Prevents particle systems from crashing you
AntiDynamicBoneCrashDescription: Prevents dynamic bones from crashing you
AntiBlendShapeCrashDescription: Tries to prevent BlendShape crashes from happening from maliciously crafted avatars
AntiLightSourceCrashDescription: Prevents too many lightsources from lagging you out
AntiAvatarLoadingCrashDescription: Prevents broken assetbundles from crashing you
AntiAvatarAudioMixerCrashDescription: Prevents avatars with maliciously crafted audio mixers from RAM crashing you
AntiPhysicsCrashDescription: Makes every physics related component uncrashable
AntiInvalidFloatsCrashDescription: Prevents invalid float numbers from crashing your game
SpooferMenuDescription: Helping features that spoofs several things thus increases your privacy
SpooferRealisticModeDescription: Realistically imitates what a real world ping/fps would look like to make you less detectable
SetSpoofedFPSDescription: Sets your spoofed FPS to something of your own liking
SetSpoofedPingDescription: Sets your spoofed Ping to something of your own liking
HWIDSpooferDescription: This feature enables/disables the hardware id spoofer, saves you from getting hwid banned
PeripheralSpooferDescription: Spoofs several devices on your computer to make you even more undetectable
SteamIDSpooferDescription: This feature completely disables steam integration - saves you from getting steam banned and tracked by people
PingSpooferDescription: This feature enables/disables the ping spoofer, so all the skids can't see your real ping and determine where you're from
FPSSpooferDescription: This feature enables/disables the fps spoofer, saves you from skids trying to call you out for having a bad pc
QuestSpooferDescription: Spoofs your platform to be on Quest (Requires restart)
AutoRegenerateDescription: Auto regenerates the several hardware ids each time you start the game
RegenerateHWIDNotice: Are you sure you want to regenerate HWID?
SettingsMenuDescription: Configure the client's settings and make it more comfortable for yourself
ReloadAvatarsDescription: Reloads all avatars in the current instance
CopyAvatarDataDescription: Copies the local player's current avatar asset url
ForceCloneDescription: Allows you to force clone any avatar except private ones
MinimumCameraClippingDistanceDescription: Allows you to go even closer to people without them disappearing
LocalizedClientDescription: Translates the whole client into your own language (If supported)
LocalizedClientCustomDescription: Uses your own customized language of choice (Requires Localized Client to be enabled)
AutoClearCacheDescription: Upon launching the game and closing the game, it will auto clear your cache, potentially freeing up space
SetCustomCrasherDescription: Lets you use a custom avatar to crash people with (Leave blank to reset)
SetCustomCrasherQuestion: Which crasher do you want to set?
SetCustomCrasherPlaceholderText: Insert avatar id(leave blank to reset)
SetCustomCrasherSuccessResetPC: Successfully reset crasher avatar for PC
SetCustomCrasherSuccessSetPC: Successfully set crasher avatar for PC
SetCustomCrasherSuccessResetQuest: Successfully reset crasher avatar for Quest
SetCustomCrasherSuccessSetQuest: Successfully set crasher avatar for Quest
ForceServerSyncDescription: Forces the server to sync all data to you so you're up to date in case something didn't automatically sync
PerformanceLimitFPSToMonitorDescription: Limits your fps to your monitor's refresh rate which is {RefreshRate} Hz (Desktop Only)
PerformanceHighPriorityDescription: When enabled it will let Windows prioritize VRChat over certain other programs
PerformanceImageCacheDescription: Caches all images, reducing both network load, and increasing performance
PerformanceLowGraphicsModeDescription: Caches every image reducing both network load and increasing performance
PerformanceNoAADescription: Disables AntiAliasing which is typically a very demanding feature
PerformanceNoShadowsDescription: Disables Realtime Shadows which is typically a very demanding feature
PerformanceNoHTDescription: When enabled it will disable HyperThreading, which will possibly cause higher fps
PerformanceNoPerfStatsDescription: Disables the performance calculation completely thus reducing lagspikes when loading avatars
PerformanceInputDelayReducerDescription: Reduces maxQueuedFrames which could potentially lead to a 16.6ms input delay reduction, but may also decrease your fps
ColorChangerMenuDescription: Recolor various stuff to your own liking
ColorChangerHyperModeDescription: Rainbow mode with LSD (Requires Rainbow Mode)
ColorChangerCustomDescription: Changes the current color to your own choice
ColorChangerMagentaDescription: Changes the current color to magenta
ColorChangerCyanDescription: Changes the current color to cyan
ColorChangerBlueDescription: Changes the current color to blue
ColorChangerRedDescription: Changes the current color to red
ColorChangerGreenDescription: Changes the current color to green
ColorChangerYellowDescription: Changes the current color to yellow
ColorChangerOrangeDescription: Changes the current color to orange
ColorChangerPinkDescription: Changes the current color to pink
DisableFeaturesMenuDescription: Toggles related to disabling certain parts of the client
DisableAllKeybindsDescription: Disables every keybind currently active in the client
DisableFBTSavingCompletelyDescription: Disables the patches for calibration saving completely (Makes client compatible with clients such as VRTools)
DisableMenuPlayerButtonsDescription: Disables the client buttons on the social page to interact with a player
DisableKeyboardImprovementsDescription: Disables certain buttons on the keyboard that was put there for QoL changes
DisableAvatarFavoritesSearchButtonDescri: Disables the search button on the client avatar favorites
DisableAvatarDatabaseDescription: Disables the client global avatar database
MediaControlsMenuDescription: Allows control over the media currently playing systemwide
MediaControlsPauseUnpauseDescription: Pause or Unpauses your current media that is playing
MediaControlsNextDescription: Skips the current song and goes on to the next one
MediaControlsPreviousDescription: Goes a song back to play the previous one
MediaControlsMuteUnmuteDescription: Mutes or Unmutes your current media that is playing
MediaControlsVolumeDownDescription: Lowers the volume of your current media that is playing
MediaControlsVolumeUpDescription: Increases the volume of your current media that is playing
MicrophoneMenuDescription: Allows you to change several features regarding your microphone
MicrophoneEarrapeVolumeDescription: Make your microphone sound like earrape
MicrophoneResetVolumeDescription: Reset your microphone back to default sound level
InstanceHistoryMenuDescription: Allows you to join back on the previous instances you've been in
PhotonExploitsMenuDescription: Features related to exploiting vrchat's underlying network infrastructure
SerializationDescription: Prevents position updates from getting sent (makes you stand still for others while you can move around yourself)
OnKeySerializationDescription: Only enables serialization when holding CTRL on Desktop or Trigger (left or right) in VR
FakelagDescription: Fakelags your position making you feel laggy to others
GhostJoinDescription: Prevents you from being seen by people when joining making you a 'ghost'
LockInstanceDescription: Prevents people from joining the lobby (Instance Master required)
VoiceImitationDescription: Imitates people speaking by sending the same voice data back to them
LagInstanceDescription: Starts lagging the whole instance using a flaw in VRChat's network infrastructure
WorldTweaksMenuDescription: A wide selection of features targetted at improving your world experience
TheGreatPugRemoveUnnecessaryDoorsDescrip: Completely removes those annoying ass doors at The Great Pug which is completely unnecessary
JustBClubDoorBypassDescription: Allows you to bypass locked doors to private rooms in Just B Club
JustBClubIntroFixDescription: Removes the annoying text whenever you join Just B Club
JustBClubVIPBypassDescription: Allows you to enter the VIP room in Just B Club
FBTHeavenDoorBypassDescription: Prevents doors from locking in FBT Heaven
VoidClubAnnoyingEntryDoorFixDescription: Completely removes that annoying entry door at void club
WorldMenuDescription: All features related to world stuff
JoinByIDDescription: Join an instance you'd like by it's world id and instance id
ItemWallhackDescription: Creates an outline around items which can be seen through walls
TriggerWallhackDescription: Creates an outline around triggers which can be seen through walls
MovementMenuDescription: Controls movement related variables on your own player
FlightDescription: Allows you to fly around (even through walls)
IncreaseGravityDescription: Makes gravity more effective, making your jumps last shorter
DecreaseGravityDescription: Makes gravity less effective, making your jumps last longer
IncreaseJumpPowerDescription: Makes you able to jump higher
ResetSpeedsClicked: Reset all player speeds back to default
ResetSpeedsDescription: Resets all player related speeds back to default
ResetJumpPowerClicked: Reset jump speed back to default
ResetJumpPowerDescription: Resets jump power back to default
VideoPlayerMenuDescription: A menu with features controlling the video players (Only SDK2 worlds for now)
QueueVideoDescription: Adds a video to the queue on the video player
QueueVideosFromFileDescription: Adds everything from Videos.txt to the queue on the video player
ExportVideosToFileDescription: Exports every video from the video player to ExportedVideos.txt
EarrapeVideoDescription: Attempts to earrape people in the instance with a certain video
PlayVideoDescription: Plays the current video on the video player
PauseUnpauseDescription: Pauses/starts the current video on the video player
PreviousDescription: Rewinds to the previous video on the video player
NextDescription: Skips the current video on the video player
StopDescription: Stops the current video on the video player
ClearDescription: Clears the video in queue on the video player
SpeedUpDescription: Speeds up the current video on the video player
SpeedDownDescription: Slows down the current video on the video player
PlayerMenuDescription: All features related to player stuff
ChangeAvatarByIDDescription: Changes your current avatar using an avatar ID
FBTCalibrationSavingError: Unable to enable feature due to either IKTweaks or FBT Saver being installed
FBTCalibrationSavingDescription: Caches your fbt calibration if you've done it previously, saving you time since you don't have to calibrate again
PlayerWallhackDescription: Creates a capsule around players you can see through walls
AttachToPlayerDescription: Attaches yourself to someones bodypart, following them around everywhere
LocalAvatarCloneDescription: Creates a local version of your avatar near you
UseAvatarCloneForSerialization: Use Avatar Clone Instead Of Skeleton
UseAvatarCloneForSerializationDescriptio: Uses an actual clone of your avatar instead of a skeleton
NameplateMenuDescription: Features related to manipulating the nameplates of people
OGTrustRanksDescription: Brings back the Veteran rank and additionally the Legendary status
CustomRanksDescription: Brings some predefined custom ranks to the game
NameplateMoreInfoDescription: Shows various information above players nameplates
NameplateRankColorDescription: Brings back nameplates colors based on ranks
ShowInstanceOwnerDescription: Shows [Host] in people's nameplate if they're the instance owner (Requires 'Nameplate More Info' to be activated)
DetectLagOrCrashDescription: Shows [Lagging] or [Crashed] in people's nameplate depending on what they are (Requires 'Nameplate More' Info to be activated)
GlobalDynamicBonesMenuDescription: Changes settings related to touching other players dynamic bones or optimizing them
GlobalDynamicBonesEnableDescription: Enables overall our dynamic bones system on configured ranks
GlobalDynamicBonesResetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all overrides?
PerformanceModeDescription: Reduces the amount of updates dynamic bones does
DisableAtDistanceDescription: Disables dynamic bones after a certain distance
VisibilityCheckDescription: Enable dynamic bones only if they're actually visible
OptimizeOnlyDescription: Disabled all features listed here and only goes for optimization of the bones
FunMenuDescription: A menu full of fun stuff
InteractWithAllPickupsDescription: Interact with all mirrors in the world
WorldTriggersDescription: Makes local triggers show for everyone
UdonGodmodeDescription: Enables godmode in specific udon worlds (e.g. Murder 4 & Among Us)
CapsuleHiderDescription: Hides your capsule from your actual avatar making you unable to be targetted by other players (fly mode gets enabled) - Thanks Skiddai <3
ItemOrbitDescription: Circles all items around a selected player
PCCrasherDescription: Tries to crash all PC users in the instance with an avatar
QuestCrasherDescription: Tries to crash all Quest users in the instance with an avatar
MurderAmongUsDescription: Certain fun stuff to give you an advantage in Murder 4 or Among Us
AntiBystanderKillscreenDescription: Removes that annoying screen where you're blinded for a certain amount of time after killing a bystander
MurderForceWeaponPickupableDescription: Allows you to pickup weapons again after killing a bystander
AnnounceKillerDescription: Shows you who the murder/imposter is when the game is starting
TeleportBearTrapDescription: Teleports a bear trap to you
MakeAllWeaponsPickupableDescription: Makes every weapon pickupable (including knifes when you're not the murderer)
MassMurderDescription: Kills all players in the game that are currently alive
PlayerOptionsMenuDescription: Various features targetted towards your selected player
BlockPhotonEventsDescription: Block incoming Photon events from this user
BlockUdonEventsDescription: Block incoming Udon events from this user
BlockRPCEventsDescription: Block incoming RPC events from this user
AntiCrashWhitelistAvatarDescription: Whitelist an avatar to not get sanitized by the AntiCrash
ItemOrbitUserDescription: Orbits all items in the world around this player
VoiceImitationUserDescription: Orbits all items in the world around this player
TeleportToUserDescription: Teleports you to the selected user
AddToFavoritesDescription: Add selected player's avatar to your favorites
CopyAvatarDataUserDescription: Copies selected player's current avatar asset url
SaveIconToDiskDescription: Saves selected player's current icon to disk
CrashUserDescription: Tries to crash user with an avatar
PlayerAttachMenuDescription: Selects a bodypart on a player to attach yourself to
AttachHeadDescription: Attaches you to the selected player's head
AttachChestDescription: Attaches you to the selected player's chest
AttachRightHandDescription: Attaches you to the selected player's right hand
AttachLeftHandDescription: Attaches you to the selected player's left hand
AttachHipsDescription: Attaches you to the selected player's hips
AttachBackDescription: Attaches you to the selected player's back
AttachRightFootDescription: Attaches you to the selected player's right foot
AttachLeftFootDescription: Attaches you to the selected player's left foot
GlobalDynamicBonesPlayerMenuDescription: Change dynamic bones related stuff on selected player's avatar
EnableOverrideDescription: When enabled it will override the default settings set for this users rank
LovenseMenuDescription: Take full control over your lovense device in-game with our immersive integration
ErrorSearchForAvatar: Error occured while searching for avatars
